column1: Fruit and vegetables are part of my eating habits every day because they provide my body with vital vitamins and valuable minerals.
I pay attention to a balanced diet and renounce fast food.
A rich and healthy breakfast is important to me and I take the time for it every day.
I pay attention to my daily fluid intake and usually drink 1.5-2 liters of water per day.
I am aware of the consequences of alcohol consumption and only enjoy a glass of beer or wine occasionally.
I know that smoking is harmful and therefore do without.
I drink no more than 1-2 cups of coffee a day.
